General.Name: Asia Electronic Material Co Ltd
General.Description: Asia Electronic Material Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and markets flexible copper clad laminates (FCCLs), coverlays, stiffeners, and bonding sheets in Taiwan. The company also offers polyimide composite films. Its products are used in various applications, including mobile and smart phones, digital cameras, laptop and tablet PCs, LCD monitors, printer inkjet and hard drive heads, various flat panel displays, touch modules, antenna panels, batteries, LED backlight module light bars, etc. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.

1.Name: Ju Shui Cai
1.Title: Associate Mang. of the Sales Department
